sections.text: of this title shall apply only to the usual restrictions and covenants limiting the use of property, the type, character and location of buildings, and covenants against nuisances and what the former parties deemed to be undesirable conditions, in, upon, and about the property, and other similar restrictions and covenants.Added by Laws 1965, c. 501, § 2. Renumbered from Title 68, § 24350 by Laws 1988, c. 162, § 161, eff. Jan. 1, 1992 and Laws 1991, c. 249, § 1, eff. Jan. 1, 1992. Amended by Laws 1999, c. 146, § 1, eff. Nov. 1, 1999.
